document_data.name: Shiala Torthren
document_data.mainbody: '''Shiala Torthren''' was a historian of the [[Earthome College]] in the [[druid]] stronghold city of [[Cedarsproke]] in the [[Gulthmere Forest]], [[Vilhon Reach]], in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: By the late-14{{th}} century DR, Shiala Torthren's expertise was renowned. Her works covered the history and politics of [[Arrabar]] in [[Chondath]] and compared them to the neighboring [[Sespech]]. She warned those who supported Sespechan independence of the impotence of [[Baron Foesmasher]]. If the leader of Sespech were to fall, other neighbors would surely feel the "gentle caress" of Arrabar next.
